channel.title: Posts on Miguel Biron-Lattes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Miguel Biron-Lattes

item.title: New member in SBGLM: sparse linear regression
item.description: Hi all! This blog is about the latest addition to my package SBGLM: a sparse linear regression.

item.title: SBGLM: Sparse Bayes Generalized Linear Models
item.description: Hey! I’ve just released a package on Github called SBGLM, which stands for Sparse Bayes Generalized Linear Models.

item.title: PhD Qualifying Course Reports: Term 1
item.description: It’s crazy how fast this first term went by! But I loved it.

item.title: BIDC: Bayesian Inference for Default Correlations
item.description: I just released a package on Github called BIDC, which stands for Bayesian Inference for Default Correlations.

item.title: Visualizing Fourier series in 2D and 3D
item.description: In this post, I will give a brief description of real valued Fourier series in higher dimensions, with some neat plots.

item.title: Demo for simple payments with linear programming
item.description: I built a webapp that implements the solution for simplifying payments described in my previous post.

item.title: Simplifying payments with linear programming
item.description: Update: I have built a demo webapp implementing the solution presented here.
